text: This is my webpage, where I showcase
myself and the work that is behind me. Enjoy!

myselfSection.heading: My self
text: Felt in love with web development. I love when nice things are functional and helpful. Trying to become a good developer step by step. Learning new things, meeting new people, apprehending new pieces of information, till my brain can’t go further.
In the meantime, I’m a cat dad that plays basketball in Germany. Also, I’m searching for new sneakers, enjoy car sims, listen to music, or read Batman comics.

heading: Bball,
nolan,
race sims
sectionWMyPhoto.text: Little about me. I do like to play basketball, so I can eat more cookies and roe, Whatever movie that Christopher Nolan makes, it’s a must-see. And if I’m not doing any of the two activities that I’ve mentioned before I am probably channeling my inner Sir Lewis Hamilton on race simulators.

work.heading: MY WORK
work.labText: Showcase of my work in my freetime. Either I'm learning new things, have new ideas or I want to showcase some of my skill. If you find anything interesting or bugs, please don't hesitate and contact me. Thank you.

introduction.heading: Software engineer
text: I’m currently working as a fresh software engineer in maintenance and support for a big corporation that makes banking solutions across the world.

Learning front-end development by myself almost for 2 years. I also have experience in the industry as IT Administrator. Currently looking for an extra part-time job, in best case scenario full remote.

introduction.heading: My Aim
text: … is to write quality code that is functional, testable, and sustainable. I’m at the start to become a good developer and I’m open to new things and opportunities that can benefit me and the others along the way.

Also, I make some basic designing/prototyping as something that comes in handy, because on some of the projects I’ve done everything by myself. Check down below that tech stack I use and other skills.

aboutMe.projects: Sadly I don’t have currently any real-work application that is normally used, just learning and creating “lab” projects to showcase my work.

myHobbies.basketball: One of my favorite hobbies to do, because it balances my life with the IT world. Currently, I’m playing for ASV Cham in Bavaria, Germany. Also, I like to watch from time to time some NBA games when there are some on schedule.
myHobbies.movies: When I want to completely switch off and just chill, I do like to play some movies rather than tv shows. One of my fav movies is 500 days of summer and everything that has a fingerprint by Christopher Nolan.
myHobbies.race sims: Another thing that allows me to get my happy hour of freedom is the racing sim. I love to play F1, Forma with the open world, or some of the serious Racing, that has an awesome community.
myHobbies.music: I do not have a lot of addictions, but music is one of them. From rap, hip-hop through rock, and indie to electronic music like Swimming. I do listen to every genre almost possible. Mainly when working because it helps me to focus on the task.

menu.1st:
Currently Software
Engineer at Diebold Nixdorf

heading: Reach
me out
footer.text: You can contact me either via the social links down below or write me an email via email link. Looking forward to hearing from you.
